text: Adnan Gulshair el Shukrijumah (, ʿAdnān Shukrī Jumaʿah) (4 August 1975 – 6 December 2014) was a member of al-Qaeda. He was born in Saudi Arabia and grew up in the United States. In March 2003, a provisional arrest warrant was issued calling him a "material witness". He was listed on theFederal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) on the Seeking Information - War on Terrorism list,FBI Seeking Information, War on Terrorism list archive, Internet Archive Wayback Machine, 3 June 2003 and since then United States Department of State, through the Rewards for Justice Program, has offered a bounty of up to US$5 million for information about his location.FBI Seeking Information Alert for el Shukrijumah Media reports surfaced on 6 December 2014 indicating that he was killed in a manhunt operation by Pakistan in South Waziristan. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Al-Qaeda people Category:Deaths by firearm
title: Adnan Gulshair el Shukrijumah
